Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the historic preservation tax credit transfer program
Summary: Establishes the historic preservation tax credit transfer program to provide flexibility and incentives for businesses which rehabilitate historic properties to further promote the development of affordable housing.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the historic preservation tax credit transfer program
